data.text: Ka jefa burodinka a bisa ruwaye,
Ka raba abin hannunka ga mutum bakwai, I, har ma takwas,
In gizagizai sun cika da ruwa,
Duk mai la’akari da iska, ba zai yi shuka ba,
Kamar yadda ba ka san hanyar iska ba,
Ka yi murna, kai matashi, a ƙuruciyarka,
Saboda haka, ka fid da tsoro daga zuciyarka
